title: Denied access to alpha client

embed.description: Album with topic of No Topic uploaded by MrAAA264. lol alpha client match making

body: ive been playing on the Alpha Client for league of legends for bout a week now. come home today after work i found that my account doesnt have access to the alpha test? i took a picture of the blind match making to show a friends yesterday. the other is the notification im getting atm

replies.body:
Can you send me a screenshot of your [account management page](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect) showing your Alpha Access status?

(Click to enlarge)

http://imgur.com/a/mvrpr
yes that was of the 1st thing i looked into that when i got denied at 1st http://imgur.com/gallery/0t8Vs

Our records indicate you weren't granted access to Alpha Client. I suspect you may have accessed it due to a bug that temporarily let players log into the Alpha without being granted access. Unfortunately, I cannot manually grant you access, but the [open beta is coming soon](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/client/client-features/client-update-alpha-ending-soon), so I recommend sticking around for that.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
i have a few other pics of me playing on the alpha client, http://imgur.com/gallery/CUaLs
